 2011-13912011-12-01NRCAN,  CNSC,  ,  ,  , 
ActNuclear Safety and Control Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Packaging and Transport of Nuclear Substances Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the PACKAGING AND TRANSPORT OF NUCLEAR SUBSTANCES REGULATIONS in order to eliminate the need to apply the packaging and transport requirements for nuclear substances already exempted from certain licensing activities under the Nuclear Substances and Radiation Devices Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2011-0283 Publication Date: 2011-12-21
